data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The reason why some gadgets or equipment become obsolete, I suppose, firstly, is that the advancement of technology is taking place rapidly. People are continuously looking for ways to get things done more easily and quickly. And with an increasing focus on science and technology, numerous amounts of funding are going into research in these fields. Therefore, every time a new invention comes out, the old generation of equipment inevitably becomes obsolete since it is outperformed by the former. For instance, a newly invented the thermometer can precisely take the temperature of an object in 1/10th of a second simply by scanning it. Then there is no longer reason for people to manually measure the temperature by using the old equipment. (120字)
data.referenceText: Why do some gadgets or equipment become obsolete? Give examples to support your answer.
data.referenceTranslate: 为什么有些小器具或设备会过时?举例子来支撑你的答案。
